location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'MAP SHOWING SELECTION BY THE BAHREIN PETROLEUM COMPANY LIMITED UNDER CONCESSION DATED DECEMBER 2ND 1925. BAHREIN ISLAND. PERSIAN GULF'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: blueprintDimensions: 470 x 1270mm, on sheet 510 x 1320mm

mods.abstract: Outline map of Bahrain produced by the Bahrain Petroleum Company (BAPCO), showing the territory covered by the Company's oil concession, with narrative description of the selection.Shows the position of posts, numbered with measurements and coordinates.Oriented with east to the top.
